rationale: The agent's diff is functionally identical to the ground truth. Both change 'index.storage.type' to 'index.store.type' in exactly two files: docs/reference/setup.asciidoc (line 47) and docs/reference/setup/installation.asciidoc (line 37). The only differences are in the index hash abbreviations (50012dc vs 50012dc57647, 7850e0c vs 7850e0cface5, etc.), which are irrelevant to the actual code changes and are simply git's shortened vs full commit hashes. The agent correctly identified both instances of the typo and fixed them as requested, with no extra or missing changes, no unsolicited documentation, and no style deviations. This is a perfect match to the ground truth at human level.
ground_truth_patch:
diff --git a/docs/reference/setup.asciidoc b/docs/reference/setup.asciidoc
index 50012dc57647..7850e0cface5 100644
--- a/docs/reference/setup.asciidoc
+++ b/docs/reference/setup.asciidoc
@@ -44,7 +44,7 @@ script. When set, both override anything set using either `JAVA_OPTS` or
 
 [source,sh]
 --------------------------------------------------
-$ bin/elasticsearch -f -Xmx2g -Xms2g -Des.index.storage.type=memory
+$ bin/elasticsearch -f -Xmx2g -Xms2g -Des.index.store.type=memory
 --------------------------------------------------
 *************************************************************************
 --
diff --git a/docs/reference/setup/installation.asciidoc b/docs/reference/setup/installation.asciidoc
index e17db47bc568..20d14f62a094 100644
--- a/docs/reference/setup/installation.asciidoc
+++ b/docs/reference/setup/installation.asciidoc
@@ -34,6 +34,6 @@ script. When set, both override anything set using either `JAVA_OPTS` or
 
 [source,sh]
 --------------------------------------------------
-$ bin/elasticsearch -f -Xmx2g -Xms2g -Des.index.storage.type=memory
+$ bin/elasticsearch -f -Xmx2g -Xms2g -Des.index.store.type=memory
 --------------------------------------------------
 *************************************************************************
